discourse_list.title: Organize date information in EIP process

content.content: Motivation Some EIPs remain “Last Call” status after review ends. This can confuse users’ understanding of the process. Furthermore, there is still a lot of fragmented information in the discussion of EIP, and the date information about the progress of each process is scarcely organized.  Proposure  Added arrangement of date information according to the status (draft, review, last call, final) of each EIP on the official website   Expected Result More readability and UX improvements in the EIP process. It helps new entrants better understand the EIP ecosystem.  Is there any way I can contribute to the above problem situation?
content.GPT-summary: The author proposes to organize date information in the EIP process to improve readability and user experience. The proposal aims to arrange date information according to the status of each EIP on the official website. The author asks for feedback and suggestions on how to contribute to the problem situation.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
